Text.val: -- Author: Stephan Huppertz
29.04.2013 JH SCR18105 Removed external flag
11.05.2011 GB SCR16419 Removed part Updates in DEBTOR_HELLER
05.05.2011 SH SCR16446 Replaced table CURR by CURA
14.04.2011 GB SCR16371 Eliminate GNRL_LANGUAGE
23.03.2011 JOH SCR16306 Replaced GNRL_CURRENCY by ADMN_CURRENCY and
GB002 by GB902
05.06.2010 GB SCR15539 Replacement calls the BMQ002 by the BMQ005
27.05.2010 GB SCR15541 Replaced table CLTC by table LTCL
09.07.2009 GB SCR14721 Added update CLHS_CLIENTUPDATED
22.04.2009 SH SCR14579 Added SILO_ID
21.11.2008 SH SCR14134 Extended PI.VARIABLETEXT_1/2 from 30 to 40 characters
27.04.2007 SH SCR12484 Added BMQ002.PI.DATE = null
on 10.1.2006 WJ SCR9863 skip updating of DEBC
26.07.2005 SH SCR8547 Added new arguments for BMQ002, both skipped
19.01.2005 SH SCR7674 Fixed bug with writing T203_TEXT = CLTC_DESCSHORT
@ Part of previous ODC206, which perfoms database updates, see SCR 5825
-- Output parameters from BDC120, have to be selected above the Link on CLTC,
to enable recomputing of Link, if variables changed by BDC120
-- Reset variables
-- Check mandatory fields, always have be in file, else error
-- Check CurrencyNew, must exist in DB
-- Check if Debtor client exists
-- Check if there is already a credit limit at another debtor client
-- Check if LimitNew already exists
-- Limit already exists and has not be be overwritten
-- Check if limit is allowed
-- If no erros and then database updates have to be performed
-- fields which have to be always updated

ExpSyntax.val: MlsTrans ('New currency is mandatory and must exists in database')
MlsTrans ('Limit already exists for the requested amount')

Text.val: -- If multiple debtor clients exists use DEBC_CREDITLIMIT > 0
... only if all T203 rows were handeld
